top_comments.comment:
I lost 30 lbs started in February. The Dr. Says I'm doin great my A1c 6.7 it was 8.
My weight was 220 now 190.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Question: Are Cisco Pasture raised eggs for real? The yolks are not bright orange like most other Pasture raised i can get even at Aldi.
Rao’s is $8.59 at Costco?  It better be $2 off.  That’s high.  I buy it for under $5 at Safeway on sale.  I think it’s $6.99 when not on sale.
